entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tadoule Lake

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
